content: Our paper "Label-aware Hard Negative Sampling Strategies with Momentum Contrastive Learning for Implicit Hate Speech Detection" has been accepted to ACL 2024.
Our paper "The hatred of all against all? Evidence from online community platforms in South Korea" has been accepted to PloS one.
Our paper "PRECYSE: Predicting Cybersickness using Transformer for Multimodal Time-Series Sensor Data" has been accepted to IMWUT (UbiComp 2024).
Our paper "An Empirical Study on Social Anxiety in a Virtual Environment through Mediating Variables and Multiple Sensor Data" has been accepted to CSCW 2024.
Sohyun and Yoonseon will join our lab as master students.
Hoyoung and Eunji graduated with their masters degree.
Our paper "Narrating Routines through Game Dynamics: Impact of a Gamified Routine Management App for Autistic Individuals" has been accepted to CHI 2024.
Our paper "A Study on the Importance of Multimodal Sensor Data in Virtual Reality" has been accepted to ICNGC 2023.
Our paper "Consistency of Code: A prompt based approach to comprehend functionality" has been accepted to APSEC 2023.

Our paper "Promoting Self-Efficacy of Individuals with Autism in Practicing Social Skills in the Workplace Using Virtual Reality and Physiological Sensors: A Feasibility Study" has been accepted to JMIR Formative Research.
Yoonseon will join our lab as a research intern.
Our paper "HearHere: Mitigating Echo Chambers in News Consumption through an AI-based Web System" has been accepted to CSCW 2024.
Our paper "V-DAT (Virtual Reality Data Analysis Tool): Supporting Self-Awareness for Autistic People from Multimodal VR Sensor Data" has been accepted to UIST 2023.
Our paper "An AI Web-based Interface for Mitigating Political Polarization" has been accepted to Journal of KIISE.
Our paper "MAC: Multimodal, Attention-based Cybersickness Prediction Modeling in Virtual Reality" has been accepted to Springer Virtual Reality.
Misun and Someen will join our lab as master students.
Our paper "Adversarial Normalization: I Can visualize Everything (ICE)" has been accepted to CVPR 2023.
Our paper "A Study on hate speech in major online communities" has been accepted to Journal of the HCI Society of Korea.
Our paper "A Competition-Aware Approach to Accurate TV Show Recommendation" has been accepted to ICDE 2023.

Our two papers "RoutineAid : Externalizing Key Design Elements to Support Daily Routines of Individuals with Autism" and "A Study on User Perception and Experience Differences in Recommendation Results by Domain Expertise: The Case of Fashion Domains." have been accepted to CHI 2023.
Our paper "KHAN: Knowledge-Aware Hierarchical Attention Networks for Accurate Political Stance Prediction" has been accepted to WWW 2023.
Misun and Someen will join our lab as research interns.
Our paper "Eyes on Me: Investigating the Role and Influence of Eye-tracking Data on User Modeling in Virtual Reality" has been accepted to PloS One.

Our two papers "VISTA: User-centered VR Training System for Effectively Deriving Characteristics of People with Autism Spectrum Disorder" and "Poster: Leveraging multimodal sensory information in cybersickness prediction" have been accepted to VRST 2022.
Our paper "Social Telecommunication Experience with Full-Body Ownership Humanoid Robot" has been accepted to International Journal of Social Robotics.
Haein will join our lab as a Ph.D student (MS & Ph.D Integrated Course), and Myungjin will join as a master student.

Our two papers "AI-Augmented Art Psychotherapy through a Hierarchical Co-Attention Mechanism" and "ST-GAT: Spatio-Temporal Graph Attention Network for Traffic Speed Prediction" have been accepted to CIKM 2022.
Youngseung will be continuing his research as a Ph.D student at the department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, UCLA. He will be advised by Professor Xiang Chen. Wish you all the best!
Our paper "APOTS: A Framework for Adversarial Prediction of Traffic Speed" has been accepted to ICDE 2022.
Myungjin will join our lab as a research intern.
Haein will join our lab as a research intern.
Dayoung and Taehyung will join our lab as Ph.D students (MS & Ph.D Integrated Course), Dasom will join as Ph.D student, and and Mingon, Hoyoung, Jaehoon, Eunji will join as master students.
Our paper "Prediction for Retrospection: Integrating Algorithmic Stress Prediction into Personal Informatics Systems for College Students' Mental Health" has been accepted to CHI 2022.
Seungwon has successfully defended his thesis and will be joining LG Electronics as a AI researcher. Congratulations!
Eunji will join our lab as a research intern.
Jaehoon will join our lab as a research intern.
Our paper "'I Have No Text in My Post': Using Visual Hints to Model User Emotions in Social Media" has been accepted to WWW 2022.
Our paper "The Workplace Playbook VR: Exploring the Design Space of Virtual Reality to Foster Understanding and Support of Autistic People in the Workplace" has been accepted to CSCW 2022.
Our paper "Adversarial Learning of Balanced Triangles for Accurate Community Detection on Signed Networks" has been accepted to ICDM 2022.
Our paper "A systematic review on fake news research through the lens of news creation and consumption: Research efforts, challenges, and future directions" has been accepted to PloS One.
Our paper "The More, The Better? Improving VR Firefighting Training System with Realistic Firefighter Tools as Controllers" has been accepted to Sensors.
Our paper "ChamberBreaker: Mitigating Echo Chamber Effect and Supporting Information Hygiene through a Gamified Inoculation System" has been accepted to CSCW 2022.
Youngseung will join our lab as a researcher.
Taehyoung, Hoyoung, and Sohyun will join our lab as undergraduate intern.
Dayoung and Mingon will join our lab as research interns.
Bogoan, Seungwan will continue their research in Human-Centered Computing Lab as Ph.D students at Hanyang University starting Fall 2021.
Our lab has moved from Ajou university to Hanyang University.
